question:
With respect to the recent cabinet clearance for setting up of the Shri Ram Janmbhoomi Teerth Kshetra, consider the following statements:
  1. The trust will be made of 15 members.
  2. The apex court recognises the ‘Janmasthan’ as a judicial entity.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The cabinet recently cleared the formation of the trust, called Shri Ram Janmbhoomi Teerth Kshetra. It is to be a 15 member body with one of the members from the Dalit community. The trust is to be formed under the 1993 Acquisition of Certain Area at Ayodhya Act.  Statement 2 is incorrect: The trust is being set up according to the November 2019 Supreme Court judgement on the Babri Masjid case. The court had recognised the deity, Sri Ram Lalla Virajman, as a legal entity but not the Janmasthan. The title of the land was awarded to the deity and is to be held by the trust.
